title: Upscaling DVD Series -- Error
body:
Hello All,

I am attempting to Upscale a DVD Series that I ripped from my collection, I keep getting this error...any help here would be appreciated. 

Thank you.

Command '['C:\\Users\\Geoff\\Downloads\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\waifu2x-caffe\\waifu2x-caffe-cui', '--tta', '0', '--gpu', '0', '--batch_size', '1', '--crop_size', '128', '--output_depth', '24', '--output_quality', '-1', '--process', 'gpu', '--model_dir', 'C:\\Users\\Geoff\\Downloads\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\waifu2x-caffe\\models\\cunet', '--noise_level', '3', '--mode', 'noise_scale', '--output_extention', 'png', '--scale_width', '1248', '--scale_height', '928', '--input_path', 'C:\\Users\\Geoff\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmp64qhigja\\1', '--output_path', 'C:\\Users\\Geoff\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpgrn45l29']' returned non-zero exit status 3221226505.

[video2x_error.log](https://github.com/k4yt3x/video2x/files/10233031/video2x_error.log)
